transcend.6:

SKT_FIRST.name: Shatter!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. If Sterope had a buff before attacking, activates an additional attack on the same target and grants <color=#28d9ed>Divine Retribution</color>.\n\n<color=#28d9ed>Divine Retribution</color>: Increases damage dealt by all allies by <color=#28d9ed>4%</color>. (Max 15 stacks)

SKT_BURST_1.effect: +1 WG damage with additional attacks\nIncreases damage

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\n5 Stacks of Divine Retribution

description: Attacks an enemy. If Sterope had a buff before attacking, activates an additional attack on the same target and grants <color=#28d9ed>Divine Retribution</color>.\n\n<color=#28d9ed>Divine Retribution</color>: Increases damage dealt by all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000057_1_2]</color>. (Max 15 stacks)

SKT_SECOND.name: Begin the Crusade
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) At the start of battle, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) At the start of battle, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000057_2_4] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Fight Ferociously!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000057_3_1] turn(s)</color> and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000057_3_4] turn(s)</color>.

2: -1 turn skill cooldowns on allies except caster
5: -1 turn skill cooldowns on allies except caster

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces the skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces the skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000057_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
